title: The Week of Ursula Richardson: Superhero Instructor
summary: Ursula Richardson, a 66-year-old retired teacher, discovers her ability to inspire superpowers in others and uses it to fight crime and empower her community.
summaryGerman: Ursula Richardson, eine 66-jährige pensionierte Lehrerin, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, anderen zu ermöglichen, Superkräfte zu entwickeln, und nutzt sie, um Kriminalität zu bekämpfen und ihre Gemeinschaft zu stärken.
summaryDutch: Ursula Richardson, een 66-jarige gepensioneerde lerares, ontdekt haar vermogen om anderen te inspireren superkrachten te ontwikkelen en gebruikt dit om criminaliteit te bestrijden en haar gemeenschap te versterken.
summaryFrench: Ursula Richardson, une enseignante retraitée de 66 ans, découvre sa capacité à inspirer des superpouvoirs chez les autres et l'utilise pour lutter contre le crime et renforcer sa communauté.

story.text: Ursula Richardson discovers her unique ability to inspire superpowers in her students during a chance mentoring session.
Armed with her newfound power, Ursula begins to train a small group of locals, focusing on harnessing their unique abilities.
Ursula and her team face their first challenge, stopping a bank heist. Ursula guides her protégés through a successful mission.
The local media catches wind of the heroic deeds, and Ursula's team receives community support and more volunteers.
Ursula feels the weight of her responsibility but finds peace in teaching others to control and use their powers for good.
An old adversary challenges Ursula directly, leading to an intense confrontation where she must outsmart the villain using her wisdom.
Reflecting on the events of the week, Ursula feels proud and hopeful. She resolves to continue developing her superhero school.

ending: Thus, Ursula Richardson not only becomes a hero herself, but she also cultivates a new generation of heroes.
moral: Empower others, and you multiply the forces of good.
